701168f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Mt. Hope Place
701168f-a.text:
Grand Concourse, east side, south from and including Mt. Hope Place to East 176th Street. The 6-story apartment house at the N.E. corner of
East 176th Street is No. 1840, the Royal Plasa.
July 17, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
701168f-a.folder: Grand Concourse & Mt. Hope Place, Bronx, NY
